name: dawn-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves a male kirlia into gallade or a female snorunt into froslass.
short_effect: Evolves a male Kirlia into Gallade or a female Snorunt into Froslass.

flavor_text.black_white: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.
